page.title: 17COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: A {communications survey} in our class produced some interesting findings.91% of the class took a {daily newspaper} and 82% took a {Sunday paper}.In addition the whole class received at least one {free paper}financed by advertising.{Television}proved very popular,with every family owning one.64% of the class thought that television was a good thing and{45% watched {more than 4 hours a night}. It is interesting that 68% of the class felt that they watched too much television.50% had a {video recorder } and were members of a local video hire club but {77% of the class still {watched mostly "live" television}. The popularity of television does not seem to have stopped children reading. {86% read books at home}but 55% felt that they should read more.
